task.title: Pineapple Sorbet
task.shortdesc: This recipe makes about 7 cups of sorbet (1.75 pints).

messagepanel.howtoavoid: Exercise caution when using a knife to prepare the ingredients

ul.li: A container with a pour spout
4 1⁄2 cups of cubed pineapple (fresh or thawed)

step.cmd: Chop all of the cubed pineapple as finely as possible.
Pour the simple syrup into your container with a pour spout, and place the sieve over top of the container.
Scoop your finely chopped pineapple into the container.
Refrigerate your pineapple – simple syrup mixture until chilled.
Your mixture is ready to be used to make sorbet.
